titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8298

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, 12 Feb 1862.

Hon:
Nat Gaither Jr
Sec of State-
There has been the following Promotions viz:

Henry B. Martin 2d Pro: to 1st Lieut:
Jos: W. Miller 1st Lieut: Pro: to Captain
Wm B. Folger 2d Pro: to 1st Lieut:
Jacob H. Smith 1st Lieut: Pro to Captain
Jesse C. Hurd 2d Pro" to 1st Lieut: (date of Com: as per your record in 25 Jan 1862)

I send Nine Commissions for record &c
1862 Feb 6_ David J. Griffiths Surgeon #1 ✓
" Joseph W. Miller Captain #2 ✓
" Jacob H. Smith " #3 ✓
" Jesse C. Hurd 1st Lieut #4 ✓
" Henry B. Martin " #5 ✓
" Wm B. Folger " #6 ✓
" James A. Miller 2d Lieut #7 ✓
" Lemach Duval " #8 ✓
1862 Feb 6_ George Taylor 2d Lieut #9 ✓

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl
